review: The Fire Stick is the answer to make a dumb TV very smart! Hardware wise it's on the lower end compared to other devices on the market but it's adequate enough for what I need. This stick has a lot more functionality than a Google chromecast and it's only $4 more.
author: Andrea G. Guerrieri

review: Much better than chromecast. No need to sync up your phone/ tablet. Just grab the remote and go. There have been some connection issues with third party apps like HBO and Netflix. However, this is usually remedied by just unplugging it for 5 seconds.
author: Drew P Millitello

review: Fire TV Stick joins my other cable alternative devices - Chromecast and Roku - to round out my TV access suite. What I like most about the Fire Stick is the immediate access to, and promotion of, Amazon original series that are free w/ Prime. Thoroughly enjoying it. Can't wait for next seasons of Mozart in the Jungle, and Alpha House.
